name: Panchtantra
title: The Panchatantra is an ancient Indian collection of moral fables featuring animal characters.

name: Cook Book
title: Thiss cookbook features easy and delicious Indian Chinese Mexican and different cuisines recipes for home cooks.

name: Mathematics Book
title: A maths book covers essential mathematical concepts and problem-solving techniques for problem solving skills

name: Harry Potter
title: Harry Potter is a fantasy book series about a young wizard's adventures at Hogwarts School.

name: Tinkle
title: Tinkle is a popular comic book series featuring entertaining stories and colorful characters for kids.

name: Atomic Habits
title: Atomic Habits by James Clear offers practical strategies for building good habits and breaking bad ones.

name: Rich Dad Poor Dad
title: Robert Kiyosaki teaches financial literacy through contrasting lessons from two father figures.

name: The Alchemist
title: Paulo Coelho follows a shepherd named Santiago on a transformative journey to pursue his dreams.

name: Let's Learn French
title: Provides essential language skills and practical exercises for beginners to master French communication.

name: Quantum Computing Book
title: Explores the principles and applications of quantum mechanics in computing.

name: Can you keep a Secret?
title: In Can You Keep a Secret? Emma accidentally spills her secrets to a stranger on a plane, only to later find out he's her company's CEO.

name: Falling in Love
title: Falling in Love by a new author portrays the myriad struggles of life through its characters' experiences and challenges.

name: Hobbit
title: It follows Bilbo Baggins as he embarks on an unexpected adventure with a group of dwarves to reclaim their homeland from the dragon Smaug.

name: And Then There Were None
title: Thrilling mystery where ten strangers are lured to an island and systematically murdered, revealing secrets from their past.

name: Class 12th PCM
title: The CBSE Class 12 coursebook covers subjects like Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, English, etc., preparing students for higher education and competitive exams.

name: Class 12th PCB
title: The CBSE Class 12 coursebook covers subjects like Biology, Physics, Chemistry, English, etc., preparing students for higher education and competitive exams.

name: Class 10th
title: The CBSE Class 10 coursebook covers subjects like Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, English, etc., preparing students for higher education and competitive exams.

name: Class 9th
title: The CBSE Class 9 coursebook covers subjects like Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, English, etc., preparing students for higher education and competitive exams.

name: Learn English
title: The Learn English book offers comprehensive language instruction, covering grammar, vocabulary, reading, writing, and speaking skills for learners of all levels.

name: Gone with the Wind
title: It ias a sweeping epic set against the backdrop of the American Civil War, following the tumultuous romance between headstrong Scarlett O'Hara and the enigmatic Rhett Butler.
